001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.HashSet;
005import java.util.Set;
006
007public enum SupportedDevices {
008    ALL(KnownDeviceModel.TSLIM_X2, KnownDeviceModel.MOBI),
009    TSLIM_X2_ONLY(KnownDeviceModel.TSLIM_X2),
010    MOBI_ONLY(KnownDeviceModel.MOBI),
011    ;
012
013    private final Set<KnownDeviceModel> models;
014    SupportedDevices(KnownDeviceModel... models) {
015        this.models = new HashSet<>();
016        this.models.addAll(Arrays.asList(models));
017    }
018
019    public Set<KnownDeviceModel> getModels() {
020        return models;
021    }
022
023    public boolean supports(KnownDeviceModel model) {
024        return this.models.stream().anyMatch(m -> m == model);
025    }
026}
